short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access MMA scores from your browser and send surveys to new participants.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Throughout the hiring process, managers are forced to bounce from tool to tool to make a hire. Boost removes these steps by connecting your current HR tech stack to Sprockets. 

Importing and analyzing candidates has never been easier.  You will no longer need to have the Sprockets platform open to get access to your reports. Simply download this chrome extension, go to any webpage on the internet, send out the Sprockets survey, and review candidates with two simple clicks. 

Sprockets' hiring solution automatically sources and identifies which applicants are the best match for specific roles and locations, empowering users to build a strong, cohesive staff that will stay long-term. In real time, both hiring managers and the applicants are notified when a "match" occurs, enabling both parties to take next steps.

Compatible with: 

- Applicant Tracking Systems
- Email Services
- Job Boards and Recruiting Software
- Candidate Lists
- Social Networks
- Onboarding and Post-Hire Tools


Features: 

- Boost Your Application Tracking System - Invite individual candidates from inside your web-based ATS to the Sprockets survey instantly. 

- Boost Your Job Boards- Invite and analyze multiple candidates from job boards and spreadsheets with a single click. 

- Boost Your Insights - Quickly review candidate scores without leaving your webpage. 

- Boost Your Hiring Process - Efficiently integrate Sprockets into your hiring process to have better insight into your candidate pool. 

-----
By installing the extension, you agree to Sprockets' Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy (https://www.sprockets.ai/terms-of-service/).
